00403 class File :
00404   public Generic_file,
00405   public Regular_file,
00406   public Directory,
00407   public Special_file
00408 {
00409   friend class Mount_tree;
00410 
00411 private:
00412   void operator = (File const &);
00413 
00414 protected:
00415   File() throw() : _ref_cnt(0) {}
00416   File(File const &)
00417   : Generic_file(),Regular_file(), Directory(), Special_file(), _ref_cnt(0)
00418   {}
00419 
00420 public:
00421 
00422   const char *get_mount(const char *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *dir,
00423                         cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mt = 0) throw();
00424 
00425   int openat(const char *path, int flags, mode_t mode,
00426              cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *f) throw();
00427 
00428   void add_ref() throw() { ++_ref_cnt; }
00429   int remove_ref() throw() { return --_ref_cnt; }
00430 
00431   virtual ~File() throw() = 0;
00432 
00433   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> mount_tree() const throw()
00434   { return _mount_tree; }
00435 
00436 private:
00437   int _ref_cnt;
00438   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> _mount_tree;
00439 
00440 };

00445 
00446 class Path
00447 {
00448 private:
00449   char const *_p;
00450   unsigned _l;
00451 
00452 public:
00453   Path() throw() : _p(0), _l(0) {}
00454 
00455   explicit Path(char const *p) throw() : _p(p)
00456   { for (_l = 0; *p; ++p, ++_l) ; }
00457 
00458   Path(char const *p, unsigned l) throw() : _p(p), _l(l)
00459   {}
00460 
00461   static bool __is_sep(char s) throw();
00462 
00463   Path cmp_path(char const *prefix) const throw();
00464 
00465   struct Invalid_ptr;
00466   operator Invalid_ptr const * () const
00467   { return reinterpret_cast<Invalid_ptr const *>(_p); }
00468 
00469   unsigned length() const { return _l; }
00470   char const *path() const { return _p; }
00471 
00472   bool empty() const { return _l == 0; }
00473 
00474   bool is_sep(unsigned offset) const { return __is_sep(_p[offset]); }
00475 
00476   bool strip_sep()
00477   {
00478     bool s = false;
00479     for (; __is_sep(*_p) && _l; ++_p, --_l)
00480       s = true;
00481     return s;
00482   }
00483 
00484   Path first() const
00485   {
00486     unsigned i;
00487     for (i = 0; i < _l && !is_sep(i); ++i)
00488       ;
00489 
00490     return Path(_p, i);
00491   }
00492 
00493   Path strip_first()
00494   {
00495     Path r = first();
00496     _p += r.length();
00497     _l -= r.length();
00498     strip_sep();
00499     return r;
00500   }
00501 
00502 };
00503

00511 class Mount_tree
00512 {
00513 public:
00514 
00515   explicit Mount_tree(char *n) throw();
00516 
00517   Path lookup(Path const &path, cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mt,
00518               cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mp = 0) throw();
00519 
00520   Path find(Path const &p, cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *t) throw();
00521 
00522   cxx::Ref_ptr<File> mount() const
00523   { return _mount; }
00524 
00525   void mount(cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &m)
00526   {
00527     m->_mount_tree = this;
00528     _mount = m;
00529   }
00530 
00531   static int create_tree(cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> const &root,
00532                          char const *path,
00533                          cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &dir) throw();
00534 
00535   void add_child_node(Mount_tree *cld);
00536 
00537   virtual ~Mount_tree() throw()  = 0;
00538 
00539   void add_ref() throw() { ++_ref_cnt; }
00540   int remove_ref() throw() { return --_ref_cnt; }
00541 
00542 private:
00543   friend class Real_mount_tree;
00544 
00545   int _ref_cnt;
00546   char *_name;
00547   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> _cld;
00548   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> _sib;
00549   cxx::Ref_ptr<File> _mount;
00550 };
00551 
00552 inline
00553 Mount_tree::~Mount_tree() throw()
00554 {}
00555 
00556 inline bool
00557 Path::__is_sep(char s) throw()
00558 { return s == '/'; }
00559 
00560 inline Path
00561 Path::cmp_path(char const *n) const throw()
00562 {
00563   char const *p = _p;
00564   for (; *p && !__is_sep(*p) && *n; ++p, ++n)
00565     if (*p != *n)
00566       return Path();
00567 
00568   if (*n || (*p && !__is_sep(*p)))
00569     return Path();
00570 
00571   return Path(p, _l - (p - _p));
00572 }
00573 
00574 inline
00575 Mount_tree::Mount_tree(char *n) throw()
00576 : _ref_cnt(0), _name(n)
00577 {}
00578 
00579 inline Path
00580 Mount_tree::find(Path const &p, cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *t) throw()
00581 {
00582   if (!_cld)
00583     return Path();
00584 
00585   for (cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> x = _cld; x; x = x->_sib)
00586     {
00587       Path const r = p.cmp_path(x->_name);
00588       if (r)
00589   {
00590     *t = x;
00591     return r;
00592   }
00593     }
00594 
00595   return Path();
00596 }
00597 
00598 inline Path
00599 Mount_tree::lookup(Path const &path, cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mt,
00600                    cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mp) throw()
00601 {
00602   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> x(this);
00603   Path p = path;
00604   Path last_mp = p;
00605 
00606   if (mp)
00607     *mp = this;
00608 
00609   while (1)
00610     {
00611       Path r = x->find(p, &x);
00612 
00613       if (!r)
00614   {
00615     if (mp)
00616       return last_mp;
00617 
00618     if (mt)
00619       *mt = x;
00620 
00621     return p;
00622   }
00623 
00624       r.strip_sep();
00625 
00626       if (mp && x->_mount)
00627   {
00628     last_mp = r;
00629     *mp = x;
00630   }
00631 
00632       if (r.empty())
00633   {
00634     if (mt)
00635       *mt = x;
00636 
00637     if (mp)
00638       return last_mp;
00639     else
00640       return r;
00641   }
00642 
00643       p = r;
00644     }
00645 }
00646 
00647 inline
00648 void
00649 Mount_tree::add_child_node(Mount_tree *cld)
00650 {
00651   cld->_sib = _cld;
00652   _cld = cld;
00653 }
00654 
00659 class Real_mount_tree : public Mount_tree
00660 {
00661 public:
00662   explicit Real_mount_tree(char *n) : Mount_tree(n) {}
00663 };
00664 
00665 inline int
00666 Mount_tree::create_tree(cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> const &root,
00667                         char const *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &dir) throw()
00668 {
00669   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> base;
00670   Path p = root->lookup(Path(path), &base);
00671 
00672   while (!p.empty())
00673     {
00674       Path f = p.strip_first();
00675 
00676       if (f.empty())
00677   return -EEXIST;
00678 
00679       char *name = strndup(f.path(), f.length());
00680       if (!name)
00681   return -ENOMEM;
00682 
00683       cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> nt(new Real_mount_tree(name));
00684       if (!nt)
00685   {
00686     free(name);
00687     return -ENOMEM;
00688   }
00689 
00690       nt->_sib = base->_cld;
00691       base->_cld = nt;
00692 
00693       base = nt;
00694 
00695       if (p.empty())
00696   {
00697     nt->_mount = dir;
00698     return 0;
00699   }
00700     }
00701 
00702   return -EINVAL;
00703 }
00704 
00705 inline
00706 const char *
00707 File::get_mount(const char *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *dir,
00708                 cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> *mt) throw()
00709 {
00710   if (!_mount_tree)
00711     {
00712       *dir = this;
00713       return path;
00714     }
00715 
00716   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> mp;
00717   Path p = _mount_tree->lookup(Path(path), mt, &mp);
00718   if (mp->mount())
00719     {
00720       *dir = mp->mount();
00721       return p.path();
00722     }
00723   else
00724     {
00725       *dir = this;
00726       return path;
00727     }
00728 }
00729 
00730 inline int
00731 File::openat(const char *path, int flags, mode_t mode,
00732              cxx::Ref_ptr<File> *f) throw()
00733 {
00734   cxx::Ref_ptr<File> dir;
00735   cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> mt;
00736   path = get_mount(path, &dir, &mt);
00737 
00738   int res = dir->get_entry(path, flags, mode, f);
00739 
00740   if (res < 0)
00741     return res;
00742 
00743   if (!(*f)->_mount_tree && mt)
00744     (*f)->_mount_tree = mt;
00745 
00746   return res;
00747 }

00769                      void **new_adr) throw() = 0;
00770 
00772   virtual int mprotect(const void *a, size_t sz, int prot) throw() = 0;
00773 
00775   virtual int msync(void *addr, size_t len, int flags) throw() = 0;
00776 
00778   virtual int madvise(void *addr, size_t len, int advice) throw() = 0;
00779 
00780   virtual ~Mman() throw() = 0;
00781 };

00851 class Fs

00860 
00862   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> get_root() throw() = 0;
00863 
00865   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> get_cwd() throw() { return get_root(); }
00866 
00868   virtual void set_cwd(cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &) throw() {}
00869 
00875   virtual int alloc_fd(cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &f = cxx::Ref_ptr<>::Nil) throw() = 0;
00876 
00883   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> set_fd(int fd, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &f = cxx::Ref_ptr<>::Nil) throw() = 0;
00884 
00890   virtual cxx::Ref_ptr<File> free_fd(int fd) throw() = 0;
00891 
00899   int mount(char const *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &dir) throw();
00900 
00908   virtual int register_file_system(File_system *f) throw() = 0;
00909 
00917   virtual int unregister_file_system(File_system *f) throw() = 0;
00918 
00926   virtual File_system *get_file_system(char const *fstype) throw() = 0;
00927 
00931   int mount(char const *source, char const *target,
00932             char const *fstype, unsigned long mountflags,
00933             void const *data) throw();
00934 
00935   virtual ~Fs() = 0;
00936 };
00937 
00938 
00939 inline int
00940 Fs::mount(char const *path, cxx::Ref_ptr<File> const &dir) throw()
00941 {
00942   if (cxx::Ref_ptr<Mount_tree> root = get_root()->mount_tree())
00943     return Mount_tree::create_tree(root, path, dir);
00944 
00945   return -EINVAL;
00946 }
00947 
00948 inline int
00949 Fs::mount(char const *source, char const *target,
00950           char const *fstype, unsigned long mountflags,
00951           void const *data) throw()
00952 {
00953   File_system *fs = get_file_system(fstype);
00954 
00955   if (!fs)
00956     return -ENODEV;
00957 
00958   cxx::Ref_ptr<File> dir;
00959   int res = fs->mount(source, mountflags, data, &dir);
00960 
00961   if (res < 0)
00962     return res;
00963 
00964   return mount(target, dir);
00965 }
00966 
00967 inline
00968 Fs::~Fs()
00969 {}
